citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:00 AM on
28-Jun-17.
Veterinary Medical Officer spoke with licensee via telephone. Licensee stated she was not available for an
inspection as she was taking a family member to a doctor's appointment.
